title: OpenAI's image model gets built-in style feature on ChatGPT
summary: OpenAI's image gen model, which is available via ChatGPT for free, now lets you easily create AI images even if you're not familiar with trends or prompt engineering. [...]

title: Abacus dark web drug market goes offline in suspected exit scam
summary: Abacus Market, the largest Western darknet marketplace supporting Bitcoin payments, has shut down its public infrastructure in a move suspected to be an exit scam. [...]
